articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Pentagon says Iranian commander Soleimani was developing plans to attack Americans
articles.description: A U.S. strike killed Iran Quds Force chief Qassem Soleimani, the Pentagon said on Thursday, adding that Soleimani was actively developing plans to attack Americans in Iraq and the Middle East.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON (Reuters) - A U.S. strike killed Iran Quds Force chief Qassem Soleimani, the Pentagon said on Thursday, adding that Soleimani was actively developing plans to attack Americans in Iraq and the Middle East.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Tesla cuts starting price for China-made Model 3 vehicles
articles.description: U.S. electric vehicle maker Tesla Inc on Friday cut the starting price for its China-made Model 3 vehicles to 299,050 yuan ($42,910.85) after receiving Chinese subsidies for electric vehicles, according to its China website.
articles.content:
SHANGHAI (Reuters) - U.S. electric vehicle maker Tesla Inc (TSLA.O) on Friday cut the starting price for its China-made Model 3 vehicles to 299,050 yuan ($42,910.85) after receiving Chinese subsidies for electric vehicles, according to its China website.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Report: Cowboys parting ways with Garrett
articles.description: The Dallas Cowboys have decided not to bring back head coach Jason Garrett, ESPN reported Thursday night, five days after the team's season ended at 8-8 and out of the postseason.
articles.content:
The Dallas Cowboys have decided not to bring back head coach Jason Garrett, ESPN reported Thursday night, five days after the team’s season ended at 8-8 and out of the postseason.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Boxing: Former heavyweight champ Spinks battling prostate cancer, says wife
articles.description: Former heavyweight boxing champion Leon Spinks, who was hospitalized last month in a serious condition, is suffering from prostate cancer, his wife Brenda said on Thursday.
articles.content:
(Reuters) - Former heavyweight boxing champion Leon Spinks, who was hospitalized last month in a serious condition, is suffering from prostate cancer, his wife Brenda said on Thursday. 
Spinks, 66, an Olympic Gold medalist in 1976 best known for a memorable … [+527 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Former Iran Guards chief vows 'vigorous revenge against America' for Soleimani killing
articles.description: A former commander of Iran's Revolutionary Guards, Mohsen Rezaei, on Friday vowed "vigorous revenge against America" for the killing of Qassem Soleimani, head of the elite Quds Force.
articles.content:
DUBAI (Reuters) - A former commander of Iran’s Revolutionary Guards, Mohsen Rezaei, on Friday vowed “vigorous revenge against America” for the killing of Qassem Soleimani, head of the elite Quds Force.

articles.author: Seng Li Peng
articles.title: Brent jumps nearly $3 after U.S. air strike kills Iran, Iraq officials
articles.description: Brent crude futures jumped close to $3 on Friday to their highest since September after a U.S. air strike killed key Iranian and Iraqi military personnel, raising concerns that escalating Middle East tensions may disrupt oil supplies.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE (Reuters) - Brent crude futures jumped close to $3 on Friday to their highest since September after a U.S. air strike killed key Iranian and Iraqi military personnel, raising concerns that escalating Middle East tensions may disrupt oil supplies.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Iran IRGC says senior commander Soleimani killed: state tv
articles.description: Iran's elite Revolutionary Guards confirmed on Friday Major-General Qassem Soleimani, head of the elite Quds Force, was killed, state-television reported.
articles.content:
(Reuters) - Iran’s elite Revolutionary Guards confirmed on Friday Major-General Qassem Soleimani, head of the elite Quds Force, was killed, state-television reported. 
Reporting by Dubai newsroom; Editing by Shri Navaratnam
